website_summaries.verdict: Attractive curved design makes this small table stand out.
pros: This table looks beautiful and is great for displaying photos or as an entryway piece
The drawer is a great feature and the veneer looks sleek
Measures 36 inches wide by 15.25 inches deep by 31.5 inches high
cons: Assembly can be a challenge and the drawer does not open or close smoothly

customer_reviews.title: Perfect entrance table! Don't think twice before buying it :)
customer_reviews.text: This table just looks great. Looks much more expensive than its price. Required 3 hours to put it together (two people highly recommended). The screw holes for the legs were a little too small. So we needed a power screwdriver to drive the screws in. Otherwise, the steps are pretty straight forward (requires time but none too complex). All pieces fit perfectly without any wobble. The table is at a perfect height for entryways. If you are in doubt, please go ahead and by it, you'll thank yourself later :)
customer_reviews.author: Sesh Narayanan

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, but need power drill and not for the inexperienced
customer_reviews.text: Looks good for its price. Top drawer does catch as mentioned in other reviews and did need a power drill as some of the holes were too small, and some effort needed putting it together. It’s not complicated but wouldn’t call assembly a piece of cake. Couldn’t get the table top in completely, but you can’t tell and it looks fine. There were no scratches and looks exactly like advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Table has a nice shape and isn't terribly wobly
customer_reviews.text: Came in with no instructions, multiple small nicks on the surfaces, some of the pre-drilled holes too small (had to use a drill to get the screws in). Table has a nice shape and isn't terribly wobly, so it has that going for it but otherwise is pretty low-end and looks it. Middle drawer hands 1/4 inch lower than the edge of the front panel due to where the rails are places (going by the pre-drilled holes). Not a good buy overall, even considering the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love love love this table
customer_reviews.text: I love love love this table!!! It is so unique looking and modern. Every single person that walks into my house comments on this table! I love it so much I want to order another one, I just need to figure out where I would put it....haha! But I feel this table is so cool and different from what you see at most people's houses that I should have more than 1!
customer_reviews.author: Nick Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Chic & Modern Table
customer_reviews.text: This table is beautiful im so happy i i chose to go forward and purchase it , it took a little bit if research before i was convinced but im glad i was ! It took a little over an hour and a half to assemble and the small drawer that comes with it could function better but for what it is and what the cost is you can't expect the perfect piece although its sexy and looks like a million bucks in any home !
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan L

customer_reviews.title: Just the right size
customer_reviews.text: This is a really beautiful table. I wanted something to get my cat food and water off the ground because we are getting a puppy. It was hard to find one that was wide enough for our autofeeder and this one is the perfect size. It was difficult to assemble and the holes didn't line up just right so we had to improvise a bit. Still very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Miss

customer_reviews.title: Great Sofa Table!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a nice sofa table that I am using for a TV stand. The assembly was not that hard, if you labeled the hardware before you start the assembly. I used a ratchet screwdriver to attach the legs of the table which made the assembly easier. I did not require a drill as some people mentioned in their review. The drawer does rub on the top of one side; that is the only drawback that I had.
customer_reviews.author: Paula J

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Even though it did take some time to assemble, the end result is worth it. Instructions are adequate (although the step by step photos do not show where to use the glue that is included). The drawer slides nicely and the whole table seems very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great entry table...
customer_reviews.text: Love this table...the drawer is an added value. I place my keys in it. Fairly easy to assemble...just follow the directions. The color is perfect, sturdy and fits perfectly in the room
customer_reviews.author: Nanci W.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Table
customer_reviews.text: This table looks great once you put it together. Putting it together was more difficult than I expected though. I had to drill out some of the screw holes, and even then I couldn't get the screws fully in...specifically the screw holes on the legs. I'm not using it for anything other than an accent table, so being a bit wobbly isn't an issue. I only gave this 3 stars because the putting this together was pain, and the table seems a bit wobbly because the issues I had putting it together. But, it does look nice.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, functional table
customer_reviews.text: Very nice table. It has weight to it, not flimsy at all. I can’t comment on putting it together since the maintenance staff did it for me but it didn’t take them long at all. They picked it up and finished it in the morning. I have since added decorative vases, k-cup holders and jars but showing here so you can see the scale. I love this table for my office.
customer_reviews.author: W.C. Banks

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't much fun to put together, but the finished product is worth it! Good quality, unique shape. Looks great on small wall I needed an interesting piece for.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: I love this side table as a decorative piece in my ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this side table as a decorative piece in my living room. I was fearful about buying furniture off of Amazon, but delightfully surprised. It is sturdy, and of decent quality. It did come in lots of pieces but the directions were east to follow. I have never put together a piece of furniture before and initially was overwhelmed looking at the instruction booklet. I took it step by step and it was quite easy. It was exactly what I was looking for and matches some of our other furniture from an expensive furniture store. You wouldn't know the difference from looking at it. I'm definitely happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Joy Amaral

customer_reviews.title: Great table
customer_reviews.text: I love this table. It's exactly as pictured and not too difficult to put together. Sturdy and takes up little space. Great for my vases and candles.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: it looks really good for the price
customer_reviews.text: for the price you can not go wrong is how I feel about the table. I have it in my dining room, it looks really good for the price, the draw is small but great for small needed items
customer_reviews.author: Tina Howard

customer_reviews.title: I'm pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.text: It is exactly as described. Fits well in my space and serves its purpose as described. The color is darker than I expected...almost black, but that is ok.
customer_reviews.author: Judith D.

customer_reviews.title: Hard to assemble but worth it
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful table. It was extremely hard to build even with two people. I drill is definitely required. The draw does not close nicely or line in up with the rest of the table. You've gotta give the draw a little bang to get it closed. I'm sure over time it'll wear away and fit better.
customer_reviews.author: Robert E Mueller

customer_reviews.title: Good Looks
customer_reviews.text: Received ahead of schedule. We purchased two and love them. Packaged well, clear instructions and after putting the first one together the second was a breeze. Great look at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: JULIE BENNY

customer_reviews.title: No adjustment once assembled.
customer_reviews.text: Not the easiest to put together but overall nice. The only main issue I have is the drawer does not open and close great. Too much friction at the top part of drawer. It touches and there is NO way to adjust or move around. They should make some engineering changes to it. 4 Stars just cause I didn't drop this one on my foot.
customer_reviews.author: Mat OutOfSight

customer_reviews.title: Great decorative table
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of this table, but it's not very stable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wrong Parts!!!
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the furniture looks nice. I received incorrect parts and was not able to put together. I had to go through the trouble of requesting the correct parts from the manufacturer and wait on them to be delivered. I needed to have the product up and ready for guest. This didn't happen. I would not recommend ordering.
customer_reviews.author: BOSSLADY1969

customer_reviews.title: The table looks beautiful once its assembled
customer_reviews.text: The table looks beautiful once its assembled. But it's a pain to assemble. You definitely need two people with drills to tighten some of the screws provided. The instructions could be clearer and easier to follow.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Modern meets Contemporary...
customer_reviews.text: Love this table!!! I was able to put the table together by myself in about an hour. My only complaint would be the instructions should direct you add the legs earlier since the compartment angles are small and make it difficult to secure screws.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Dukes

customer_reviews.title: Good. Looks nice.
customer_reviews.text: Drawer catches at the top when closing, but otherwise it's nice a nice table.
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: The quality met my expectation although it's still a little ...
customer_reviews.text: The quality met my expectation although it's still a little pricey. The installation was simple and I did not see any scratches. My only complaint is that there were a few holes that were made a bit small. I had to use a drill to make the holes bigger in order to get the screws in the back side.
customer_reviews.author: Anlau

customer_reviews.title: Nice Table
customer_reviews.text: This was a great find. I really like the look and it’s sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: K. M. G.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our use in our office as an accent piece to put a few small things on.
customer_reviews.author: Dm152

customer_reviews.title: Overall I am quite happy with this piece with two reservations
customer_reviews.text: Was fairly straightforward to put together for anyone who has put IKEA type furniture together in the past. Overall I am quite happy with this piece with two reservations: 1. the drawer when closed does not sit flush with the bottom rim as shown in the photo and 2. the piece shows fingerprints quite easily. Otherwise I am satisfied :)
customer_reviews.author: Hossein Parandeh

customer_reviews.title: Assembly was relatively easy, a little difficult to in sert screws as ...
customer_reviews.text: Assembly was relatively easy, a little difficult to in sert screws as they are in a tight spot but was definitely worth the effort. LOOKS GREAT!
customer_reviews.author: Joe Spizzirri

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: We don't usually buy furniture without being able to see the quality but we trusted the reviews and are very pleased. Easy to assemble and high quality addition to entry way for a very affordable price.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, once put together
customer_reviews.text: It was a bit of a pain to put together - definitely need two people and some patience, but once that part is done, the finished product is very nice. It looks a little brown in my pic, but that's just the lighting - it's definitely black.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, good material, great buy for the money. Its not the best product out there but its surely the best for the price.
customer_reviews.author: I. Cohen

customer_reviews.title: Nice table.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome table. Good material, love the color it looks like a very expensive table great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Kashaira Parrott

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Love this table! It looks amazing and was fairly easy to set up. Putting the legs on were the tricky part in putting it together but everything else was very easy to do. Great height and size.
customer_reviews.author: KatCrz

customer_reviews.title: Assembly is not fun and will take 2 hours
customer_reviews.text: Product is nice looking but takes and advance level IKEA veteran and about two hours to assemble. Had I know it took so long and required heavy wrist to screw in the legs I probably would have ordered something else.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Krahenbuhl

customer_reviews.title: Great looking entrance way table.
customer_reviews.text: I have placed the table in my entrance way and have received many compliments on it. People are rather surprised to hear that this table came out of a box as the construction of the table is well done The table arrived packaged very well with all parts clearly marked. The table was rather easy to put together when following the instructions. The whole process from opening the box to completeion was 35 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: David Blinkoff

customer_reviews.title: Very good weight and excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Very good weight and excellent quality. Put together in about 15 minutes. This will make a very good addition to my beautiful home!
customer_reviews.author: Alex Zaldana

customer_reviews.title: Great Entry Table or Couch console
customer_reviews.text: This was a little tricky to put together and it is not put together well. However it looks real good. It was just what I was looking for. I added a crystal-like knob to mine to give it some chicness.
customer_reviews.author: LaShonda F.

customer_reviews.title: Nice design
customer_reviews.text: I love the way the console looks. Very nice design. The instructions were easy to follow and we put it together in about an hour. It gets lots of compliments--it's in my entryway.
customer_reviews.author: J.D.

customer_reviews.title: Have to give 4 star just because looks beautiful but the material isnt the best but for the ...
customer_reviews.text: Have to give 4 star just because looks beautiful but the material isnt the best but for the price is worth. Little hard to put it together
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this piece
customer_reviews.text: I love this piece. We use it as an entry table, and while the drawer doesn't feel too sturdy, it is a beautiful piece to add character to the home.
customer_reviews.author: Anderson's

customer_reviews.title: A Great Deal
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful table, much nicer than I had anticipated for the low price. I love the style and design, very modern. I had looked on line and in furniture stores before I finally found this gem. Assembly is easy if you can use a few basic tools and can follow written directions.
customer_reviews.author: KatinDm

customer_reviews.title: but very functional and pleased with the delivery and price
customer_reviews.text: Table was a little time consuming to assemble, but very functional and pleased with the delivery and price!
customer_reviews.author: Bassmen

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!!
customer_reviews.text: Instructions could be a little more user friendly but after putting it together I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Rayford

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful table, packaged very well. Highly recommend this item - best price found on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what all the fuss is. I'm not a carpenter and I had it done in 45 minutes while watching TV. Well made and sturdy for a hallway table. If you want a TV stand, this may not be a perfect option.
customer_reviews.author: James Snide

customer_reviews.title: Its a beautiful table. Took a while to put together but ...
customer_reviews.text: Its a beautiful table. Took a while to put together but love it❤
customer_reviews.author: Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I love this table. It didn't take long to assemble and the quality is great. It looks great in my entry.
customer_reviews.author: April K

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble, looks great
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my 21 inch iMac computer. Just the right size. Seems well crafted so far and looks more than the price.
customer_reviews.author: Johnnyboy628

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great item packaged extremely well. Super easy to assemble. Would recommend and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: IT

customer_reviews.title: Horrible screws
customer_reviews.text: Very hard to assemble with the type of screws they provide! Still cant manage ro finish it. I might have to return it :(
customer_reviews.author: dania tabikha

customer_reviews.title: No Instuctions and tried several times to contact amazon and ...
customer_reviews.text: No Instuctions and tried several times to contact amazon and the manufacturer for the instruction manual and just going in circles!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wow Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I love this table. It is beautiful. Lot of pieces to put together but it was worth it. Great addition to my foyer.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Lodanski

customer_reviews.title: Looks great. My boyfriend was a little frustrated putting it ...
customer_reviews.text: Looks great. My boyfriend was a little frustrated putting it together because the holes were not quite big enough for the screws.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer L. Perry

customer_reviews.title: a great piece of furniture
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, very sturdy a great piece of furniture
customer_reviews.author: Howard Y. Held

customer_reviews.title: Excellent entryway statement piece!
customer_reviews.text: Sleek, classy, modern, this table is the perfect fit in my foyer. Well made and exactly what I wanted!
customer_reviews.author: Nan Tibolla

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with the purchase. It was easy to assemble and looks great in my entry way! It looks exactly like the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Chambliss

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs down
customer_reviews.text: Don't bother with this table. It took forever to Build. At the end, we ended with pieces of hardware that the instructions didn't explain. The table is wobbly and the drawer doesn't sit right in the track.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Jaffe

customer_reviews.title: Good deal!!!
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews and almost did not get it... However, glad I did.. I found it easy to assemble, did not take hours and it looks great. All parts were there and I have no complaints. Great value for the Money but don't expect top of line, heavy furniture.
customer_reviews.author: fredvcole

customer_reviews.title: dont like it at all
customer_reviews.text: Hate it its nothing like it look s very cheap look n when it came it was damage
customer_reviews.author: tiffany ivory Moore

customer_reviews.title: If you're not handy don't buy it. It doesn't ...
customer_reviews.text: If you're not handy don't buy it. It doesn't worth for $100. I think they over priced this item.
customer_reviews.author: Shermy

customer_reviews.title: Purchase this table as an entryway piece. I was ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchase this table as an entryway piece. I was able to build the table by myself. I'm commented often on this piece.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: The perfect table to were looking for
customer_reviews.text: The perfect table to were looking for! It's edgy and elegant, and makes a bold statement. Not nearly as hard to put together as some stated, it just takes patience and really reading the instructions. Worth it for the price and quality. Plenty of space in the one drawer for keys, sunglasses. Beautiful!!
customer_reviews.author: Helen GriffisTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Table came on time. Quality material my brother took his time to put it together. And he did an awesome job. Love the table and it beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: AppleFace24

customer_reviews.title: Super Pleased with Product
customer_reviews.text: My table arrived in a very timely fashion. Was tedious, as any assembly required furniture. HOWEVER very easy, and still a simple task to do solo. All the pieces fit correctly and there was no wobble once assembled. Table looms gorgeous, just as in the photo. I am in love with my new piece!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Was looking for a good entryway table for a while...
customer_reviews.text: Inexpensive. It's a nice piece of furniture. I placed it in my entryway, as soon as you enter the house. Enough space to place many things on it. The only thing I don't enjoy is dust motes on it, and sometimes, smudges. But for the price and the look, I cannot really complain. The design is nice too, and I've received a couple of compliments on it so far.
customer_reviews.author: SummerTimeSadness

customer_reviews.title: Rickety, very poor quality
customer_reviews.text: At this price point I know I am buying particle board but this is not the good kind. The table looks great but is rickety and creaky. Not very stable. The instructions are very good, thats thats the only plus!
customer_reviews.author: LiteraryAspirations

customer_reviews.title: Console table
customer_reviews.text: It's a beautiful entry way table. I couldn't get four of the screws in all the way so we'll see how it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Dianahm

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I love it in it was easy to put together! Just the right sizes for a hallway. I recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Jason

product_meta.title: ioHOMES Bond 1-Drawer Console/Sofa Table, Black
product_meta.description: Color:BlackBeautifully shaped, this contemporary console table adds a sense of balance and symmetry to any room, including narrow hallways and entryways. Featuring a center storage drawer to collect keys and mails, the table provides a bottom shelf for additional display space. Accent table materials consist of medium fiber board and strength enhancing veneers finished in a beautiful cappuccino finish. Imported; Product made in China. Assembly required. Once assembled, product measures 31.5 inches high x 36 inches wide x 15.25 inches deep; Drawer dimensions: 3.5 inches high x 11.5 inches wide x 10 inches deep; Underneath shelf dimensions: 11.75 inches deep x 23.5 inches wide; Cleaning suggestions: Dust or wipe clean with damp cotton cloth. Accessories and decorations NOT included.
feature_bullets: Materials: MDF & Veneers; Finish: Black; Rectangular table top panel
One storage drawer runs smooth on metal glides; one-shelf below for storage or display space
Used as an entryway table to collect keys and mail, or play up its decorative side by using it in a living area to showcase collectibles
Drawer dimensions: 3.5 inches high x 11.5 inches wide x 10 inches deep
Overall dimensions: 31.5 inches high x 36 inches wide x 15.25 inches deep

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars135 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
